name: B. Candies Division
statement:

divide as many candies as possible between all k kids. Santa can’t
divide one candy into parts but he is allowed to not use some candies at
all.Suppose the kid who recieves the minimum number of candies has a
candies and the kid who recieves the maximum number of candies has b
candies. Then Santa will be , if the both conditions are met at the same
time: b - a

candies () does not exceed
lfloor
frac{k}{2}
rfloor (less than or equal to
lfloor
frac{k}{2}
rfloor).
lfloor
frac{k}{2}
rfloor is k divided by 2 and rounded to the nearest integer. For
example, if k=5 then

lfloor

rfloor=2.Your task is to find the maximum number of candies Santa can
give to kids so that he will be .You have to answer t independent test
